result.execSummary:
The defendant Tommy L Knutowski was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Straight Time. Sentence credit of 5 days was granted. TIME SERVED.

Court grants sentence credit of 27 days applied to costs on Count 1. ($443.00) PAID IN FULL. 
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Case called at 9:17 a.m.
Attorney Charlie Hoffmann in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Angela Wang in court for Tommy L Knutowski.
Defendant Tommy L Knutowski in court, in custody.  
Court conducts plea colloquy with the defendant.
Defendant enters a plea of No Contest to Counts 1 and 2.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of Counts 1 and 2.
Count 3 is dismissed and read-in.
State makes sentencing recommendations.
Defense makes sentencing recommendations.
Defendant makes statements.

COUNT 1
Court orders the following:
5-DAYS JAIL
5-DAYS CREDIT TIME
COURT CONSIDERS TIME SERVED.

COSTS: $243.00 (COURT CONSIDERS COSTS PAID)
DNA SAMPLE AND SURCHARGE:  $200.00 (COURT CONSIDERS SURCHARGE PAID)
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
*Defendant has an additional 27-days credit to be applied to the costs/surcharges*

COUNT 2
Court orders the following:
10- DAYS JAIL
10- DAYS CREDIT TIME
COURT CONSIDERS TIME SERVED.

COSTS: $243.00 (COURT CONSIDERS COSTS PAID)
DNA SAMPLE AND SURCHARGE:  $200.00 (COURT CONSIDERS SURCHARGE PAID)
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
*Defendant has an additional 27-days credit to be applied to the costs/surcharges*
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 27, 2022 at 09:00 am.
dated 10-24-2022 from Atty. Angela Wang, requesting a plea and sentencing date
Pre-trial conference on November 11, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection.
